work.name: Control Systems Engineering Lab, Arizona State University
work.summary: Developed and applied model-based control in multidisciplinary mHealth interventions.
highlights: Developed predictive models for physical activity interventions (JustWalk JITAI, YourMove, HeartSteps II)
Reduced simulation computation time by over 65% through stochastic search optimization
Created end-to-end automation of intervention delivery systems

work.summary: Process improvement and controls engineering for water treatment plants.
highlights: Improved yield by ~10% and reduced oscillations by 20% through control loop tuning
Wrote SOPs and trained operators, reducing turnaround time by 25%
Ensured full compliance with EPA and safety regulations
